title: Curing and Drying Cannabis With David Sandelman
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: David Sandelman is Chief Engineer at Cannatrol, a precision drying/curing system for cannabis. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the similarities between drying and curing meat, cheese and cannabis. They also discuss the sector's resistance to new technology and how his invention helps control humidity in the flower. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
